mapper.sql: id, user_id, trade_no, bank_code, bank_name, subject, description, create_time, money_type, amount

mapper.insert: insert into tb_recharge_jdpay (id, user_id, trade_no, bank_code, bank_name, subject, description, create_time, money_type, amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{moneyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
